section.title: EVMResourcePoolList
section.para: EVMResourcePoolList retrieves all of the id and name values of the ResourcePool instances stored in the VMDB.

listitem.para: Output: VMdbWs..ResourcePoolList. Each VmdbWs..ResourcePool object contains the guid and name of a ResourcePool.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EVMResourcePoolList usage:

example.title: EVMResourcePoolList WSDL
example.programlisting:
<message name="EVMResourcePoolList"> </message> <message name="EVMResourcePoolListResponse"> <part name="return" type="typens:VmdbwsSupport..ResourcePoolListArray"/> </message>
<xsd:complexType name="VmdbwsSupport..ResourcePoolList"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType>
